body: Does anyone know when the update for the website is coming because I want to add some friends !
body_tagged: Does anyone know when the update for the website is coming because I want to add some friends !
title: When's the website update?

replies.body:
Oh hey mate,
Just letting ya know No One knows. But as a map dev stated they'll try and get a new hub out shortly before January. I suspect it will be in January..
replies.body_tagged:
Oh hey mate,
Just letting ya know No One knows. But as a map dev stated they'll try and get a new hub out shortly before January. I suspect it will be in January..

replies.body: No news regarding any updates. Please wait for further announcements. :D
replies.body_tagged: No news regarding any updates. Please wait for further announcements. :D

replies.body:
Not sure, Ivy keeps adding new features, so the update has gone from a small revamp to a complete re-styling and lots of new features, which has pushed the release back a lot.

He did the same thing when he was making Avicore, so I would count on it being released early 2015.
replies.body_tagged:

He did the same thing when he was making Avicore, so I would count on it being released early 2015.

replies.body:
Let him take his time.
Don't rush it.

I would rather it take a long time and for it to be perfect.
As opposed to,
Being released tomorrow and having problems.
